content: Head back to the left along the edge of the platform, and you'll find the third **Purple Talisman Altar** , which you can pluck the talisman from (the last altar we won't find until we reach the next major area).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Relief of the Fallen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Head back to the left along the edge of the platform, and you'll find the third **Purple Talisman Altar** , which you can pluck the talisman from (the last altar we won't find until we reach the next major area).
